src_original: ehi vatsa mahāyānaṃ mantracaryānayaṃ vidhim /  deśayiṣyāmi te samyak bhājanas tvaṃ mahānaye // 192
mantraprayogam atulaṃ yena bhagnaṃ mahābalam /  mārasainyaṃ mahāghoraṃ sākyasiṃhādibhir varaiḥ // 194
tasmān matim imāṃ vatsa kuru sarvajñatāptaye // 195
na bhūyo maraṇaṃ vo 'sti yānād asmān mahāsukhāt /
adhṛṣyāś cāpy abaddhāś ca ramadhvam akutobhayāḥ // 379

saṃbhūtāḥ śāsinām agrā atyantabhavasiddhaye // 380  ayaṃ vaḥ satataṃ rakṣyaḥ siddhaḥ samayasaṃvaraḥ /  sarvabuddhaiḥ samaṃ proktā ājñā paramaśāśvatī // 381  bodhicittaṃ na vai tyājyaṃ yad vajram iti mudrayā /
